pinyin: wai4 guo2 ren2 ju1 zhu4 zheng4 ming2

sentences.english: I only brought my passport and the Foreign Employment License.
sentences.chinese: 我只带了护照和外国人就业证。

sentences.english: It took only a short walk on a Beijing street to find other foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京街头仅走了一小段路来寻找其他的外国人。

sentences.english: Overseas chinese are bring into foreigners since 2000.
sentences.chinese: 从2000年起，华侨并入外国人统计。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满一年的人员。

sentences.english: It is not just foreigners who worry.
sentences.chinese: 担心这个问题的不仅是外国人。

sentences.english: Many foreigners now go to Hanshan Temple to celebrate Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 现在有许多外国人也去寒山寺庆祝春节。

sentences.english: I was later told that the dogs in Jinping had been barking at the foreigner running in the streets.
sentences.chinese: 后来有人告诉我，金平的狗见了外国人会叫个不停。

sentences.english: Who was this foreigner who was treated with such reverence?
sentences.chinese: 这位如此受尊敬的外国人是谁呢？

sentences.english: How to handle “the ratification of foreigners' travel to Tibet”?
sentences.chinese: 如何办理“外国人入藏旅游批准函”？

sentences.english: So many foreigners aspire to Chinese culture because of the prosperities in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我们国家欣欣向荣，好多外国人都十分向往中国文化。

sentences.english: I suppose every foreigner would manage to see one.
sentences.chinese: 我想每个外国人都会设法去看看的。

sentences.english: I still remember the foreigner I met in Cuihu Park three years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得我三年前在翠湖公园里遇到的那个外国人。

sentences.english: Foreign tourists how to travel in Tibet?
sentences.chinese: 外国人为何需要办理“入藏旅游批准函”？

sentences.english: The lawyer  ascertained that a policeman had indeed dealt roughly with foreigners on several occasions.
sentences.chinese: 律师证实有个警察确实多次粗鲁地对待外国人。

sentences.english: Foreigners can't help living because they were born there.
sentences.chinese: 外国人没办法才住在那儿是由于他们出生在那儿。

sentences.english: My quality of language is very good. I can communicate with foreigners easily.
sentences.chinese: 我的外语水平很好，我能轻松地与外国人交流。

definition: Internet slang for 外國人|外国人[wai4 guo2 ren2]
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
